entry.title: GB V04
entry.summary: A new version of Secure Instant Messenger, V04, has been released and is available for download from Sourceforge.net. The software, also known as GoldBug, is designed to provide secure communication through instant messaging. The release comes with various features such as end-to-end encryption, voice and video chat options, file transfer, and group chat capabilities. GoldBug is an open-source software that is available for free and can be downloaded on Windows, Linux, and macOS platforms. It offers strong security measures to protect user information and privacy, including a decentralized architecture that ensures no central servers are involved in the communication process. Additionally, users have the option to create anonymous accounts and use Tor network integration to further enhance their anonymity.With its latest version, GoldBug has introduced several updates, including improved stability and performance, enhanced support for multiple languages, and better compatibility with various operating systems. Furthermore, the software now supports additional network protocols such as I2P and Freenet, allowing users to connect with others securely on these networks.Overall, Secure Instant Messenger (GoldBug) is a reliable and secure messaging tool that provides end-to-end encryption and other advanced features to ensure secure communication. Users can download the latest version of the software from Sourceforge.net and enjoy its enhanced functionality and improved performance.
